wikipedia_page.main: Air Vice Marshal Brian Courtenay Yarde,  (5 September 1905 – 29 October 1986) was a Royal Air Force officer during the Second World War and a senior commander in the 1950s.

link_mentions.page: List of people educated at Bedford School
response: *Air Vice-Marshal Brian Courtenay Yarde CVO CBE (1905–1986), Commandant-General of the RAF Regiment, 1954–1957
